screenshot

Description:
Exception is thrown out when double click the dynamic image in the report.

Build number: 
2.2.1.v200708029-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. Select from Main Menu Window->Show View->Other...->Report and Chart Design
   ->Report Examples.
2. Select Libraries->Newsfeeds_After.rptdesign and select "Open".
3. Double click to open Newfees_After.rptdesign and double click to open the dynamic image in the table header.

Expected result:
No exception and in "Edit Image Item" dialogue, "Dynamic image" is selected.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out and in "Edit Image Item" dialogue "Image file in shared resources" is selected.

Error log:

When upgrade the old report, the dynamic image expression type is improperly transformed to URL type.
Exception is still thrown out in build (2.3.0.v20071026-1107), reopen.
Please try latest nightly build. The exception was not thrown. It is acceptable that "Image file in shared resources" is selected since the sample report is somehow no specified image type.
